Description:
Required skills to be successful:A minimum of 1-2 years' experience in selling reputed make of commercial vehicles.
Gulf region experience 
Strong communication skills
Strong interpersonal skills with aptitude in building relationships professionals of all levels.
Excellent organisational skills 
Negotiation skills
Problem solving skills  About the Team:You will be working in a fast paced and diverse environment, and reporting directly to the Sales Manager.  What equips you for the role:A good understanding of Automotive Fleet Sales in general and Commercial Vehicles in specific shall be an advantage.
University graduate, engineering background will be an added advantage. 
Valid Qatar driving licence Job Details
